mapper.sql: ID, PINDEX, NAME, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, POSTAL_CODE, ADDRESS, CONTACT_WAY, STATUS, REJECT_TYPE, REJECT_REASON, QQ, MSN, ORIGIN, MARRIAGE, DEGREE, WORK_EXP, INDUSTRY, SALARY, CERT_TIME, CERT_STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY, MODIFY_TIME, DELETE_FLG, VERSION, TO_SPECIAL, LOCK_USERID, LOCK_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_person
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_person (ID, PINDEX, NAME, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, POSTAL_CODE, ADDRESS, CONTACT_WAY, STATUS, REJECT_TYPE, REJECT_REASON, QQ, MSN, ORIGIN, MARRIAGE, DEGREE, WORK_EXP, INDUSTRY, SALARY, CERT_TIME, CERT_STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY, MODIFY_TIME, DELETE_FLG, VERSION, TO_SPECIAL, LOCK_USERID, LOCK_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rejectType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriage,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{degree,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{workExp,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{industry,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{salary,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{certTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{certStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toSpecial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update sys_person
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PINDEX = #{record.pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_TYPE = #{record.idType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ID_NO = #{record.idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTAL_CODE = #{record.postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_WAY = #{record.contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REJECT_TYPE = #{record.rejectType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REJECT_REASON = #{record.rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ = #{record.qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSN = #{record.msn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN = #{record.origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARRIAGE = #{record.marriage,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DEGREE = #{record.degree,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
WORK_EXP = #{record.workExp,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
INDUSTRY = #{record.industry,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
SALARY = #{record.salary,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CERT_TIME = #{record.certTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CERT_STATUS = #{record.certStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_IDENTITY = #{record.createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_USER = #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY = #{record.modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_FLG = #{record.deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TO_SPECIAL = #{record.toSpecial,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOCK_USERID = #{record.lockUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCK_TIME = #{record.lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_person set PINDEX = #{pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_TYPE = #{idType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTAL_CODE = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_WAY = #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REJECT_TYPE = #{rejectType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSN = #{msn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARRIAGE = #{marriage,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DEGREE = #{degree,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, WORK_EXP = #{workExp,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SALARY = #{salary,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CERT_TIME = #{certTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CERT_STATUS = #{certStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY = #{createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY = #{modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_FLG = #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TO_SPECIAL = #{toSpecial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOCK_USERID = #{lockUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCK_TIME = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM SYS_PERSON WHERE ID_NO=#{value} AND DELETE_FLG = 0

SELECT
,(select mobile from usr_user u where u.per_id = s.id and u.delete_flg = 0) mobile ,(select name from sys_code sc where sc.type = 'per_id_type' and sc.code = id_type) perIdTypeName FROM SYS_PERSON s WHERE ID=#{value} AND DELETE_FLG = 0
